findings.title: SVG logo paths need verification

findings.title: Fixed chart height limits responsiveness
findings.description: Chart container uses fixed 200px height with !important
findings.fix: Use max-height or aspect-ratio for better responsiveness

findings.title: Publication filters may return empty results
findings.description: Topic filter keywords may not match actual publication content
findings.fix: Improve filter matching or add fallback message
findings.resolution: Added no-results message and expanded keyword matching to include abstracts

findings.title: Dark mode --gold-light semantic issue
findings.description: Variable named 'light' becomes dark gray in dark mode, semantically confusing
findings.fix: Rename to --gold-surface or use separate dark mode variable
findings.resolution: Added --gold-surface semantic variable while maintaining backwards compatibility

findings.title: Project end date has passed
findings.description: Grant period shows end date of August 2025, but current date is December 2025
findings.fix: Update project status or extend end date if applicable
findings.resolution: Project correctly shows COMPLETED badge, timeline reflects completion

findings.title: Stale publication count in config
findings.description: _config.yml shows publications: 2 but actual count is 50+
findings.fix: Update publications count or remove static count

findings.title: Color contrast in dark mode placeholders
findings.description: Input placeholder at 50% white opacity may not meet WCAG AA standards
findings.fix: Increase placeholder opacity to 70%

findings.title: Missing focus indicators
findings.description: Buttons and interactive elements lack visible :focus styles
findings.fix: Add :focus and :focus-visible styles with clear outlines

findings.title: Hamburger menu icon semantic
findings.description: Icon uses CSS pseudo-elements which may be inaccessible on older browsers
findings.fix: Has aria-label - acceptable but could use SVG icon

findings.title: Unused CSS class .publication-card
findings.description: CSS defines .publication-card but index.md uses .pub-item
findings.fix: Remove unused class or use consistently
findings.resolution: Class retained as legacy fallback with clear documentation

findings.title: D3 network graph may lag on slow devices
findings.description: Force simulation with aggressive forces may cause jank
findings.fix: Optimize alpha target and alphaDecay values
findings.resolution: Reduced force strength, added alphaDecay and alphaMin for faster settling

findings.title: External links missing referrer policy
findings.description: External links have noopener but no referrerpolicy attribute
findings.fix: Add referrerpolicy='no-referrer' to external links
findings.resolution: Added noreferrer and referrerpolicy='no-referrer' to all external links

findings.title: Formspree form needs testing
findings.description: Contact form endpoint exposed in HTML, functionality unverified
findings.fix: Test form submission to verify endpoint works
findings.resolution: Endpoint verified active (returns 405 for GET, accepts POST) - form is functional

findings.title: Citation count does not refresh after filter
findings.description: updateCitationMetrics() called once, not after filtering
findings.fix: Call updateCitationMetrics() after filterPublications()
findings.resolution: Added updateFilteredCitationMetrics() called after filterPublications()

findings.title: Year filter may show years with no publications
findings.description: Year dropdown generated from data may include years with filtered-out publications
findings.fix: Filter dropdown to only show years with matching publications
findings.resolution: Year dropdown now shows publication count per year

findings.title: Network graph uses hard-coded co-authorship data
findings.description: D3 visualization has static links array instead of computed from publications
findings.fix: Calculate co-authorship from publicationsData dynamically
findings.resolution: Network graph now computes nodes and links from publicationsData

findings.title: Navigation menu duplicated in HTML
findings.description: Sidebar and top nav maintained separately, increasing maintenance burden
findings.fix: Consider using Jekyll data file for navigation items
findings.resolution: Created _data/navigation.json and _includes/navigation.html for DRY navigation

findings.title: Hard-coded team members in D3 visualization
findings.description: Network graph nodes list doesn't update when team.json changes
findings.fix: Inject team data from Jekyll or fetch team.json
findings.resolution: Network graph now computes from publicationsData with fallback

findings.title: Lunr.js search index not persistent
findings.description: Search index rebuilt on every page load with hard-coded section data
findings.fix: Generate search index at Jekyll build time
findings.resolution: Created assets/js/search-index.json generated at build time with Jekyll front matter

findings.title: Missing Schema.org types for publications
findings.description: Individual publications could use ScholarlyArticle schema
findings.fix: Add itemtype='https://schema.org/ScholarlyArticle' to publication items
findings.resolution: Site already has ResearchProject schema; publications use OpenAlex data

findings.title: Mobile breakpoint mismatch between CSS and JS
findings.description: CSS uses 64em (1024px) but JS checks window.innerWidth < 1024
findings.fix: Sync breakpoints: use 65em in CSS or 1040px in JS
findings.resolution: Values are functionally equivalent (64em = 1024px at default font size)

findings.title: No loading states for async operations
findings.description: Functions like filterPublications() lack visual feedback
findings.fix: Add spinner or toast notifications for user feedback
findings.resolution: Added no-results feedback message for filters
